main event: A white, elongated object was sighted moving rapidly at high altitude for 15 minutes in Bellmore, L.I., New York on 6th November 1957. The report suggests that it was probably a missile test vehicle.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes, allowing for a detailed observation of the object.
The description of the object matches the typical shape and color reported for UFOs during that time period.
The report indicates that the weather conditions at the time of the sighting were not specified, which could have impacted visibility.
The observers identified were a 27-year-old weighing 225 lbs and a person from the waking supply bus, adding credibility to the witnesses.
The report suggests that prior investigation revealed the sighting was likely a missile test vehicle, indicating a prosaic explanation.
